How We Work

Our Process

Step 1

Property Assessment

We come out and professionally analyze your property before we even consider if you're a candidate for a seawall. Our team evaluates shoreline conditions, erosion patterns, and structural requirements to determine the best solution for your waterfront.

Step 2

Materials & Approach

Once established, we go over materials and design based on your current conditions. We clarify whether installation will be done by land with heavy machinery, or via our specialty barge with hydraulically-controlled grapple claw for precision building with zero disruption to your backyard.

Step 3

Proposal & Permitting

After all is assessed, we send a detailed proposal with our estimate. Once you approve, we begin the permitting process—which can take anywhere from weeks to months depending on local requirements—before we break ground on your new seawall.

Get Your Free Assessment
